content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”749″ img_size=”300×150″ alignment=”center”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Standard 90 Day Warranty ” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:55px|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]Metro Auto Salvage Parts are covered by a Standard 90 Day Warranty. Extended Warranty Options are available for Purchase. See Our Extended Warranty packages below. Please refer to our customer support professionals to determine what warranty upgrade package fits your specific needs.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1544735136310{background-color: #ffe802 !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=” Extended Warranty Packages” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_separator color=”black” style=”shadow” border_width=”6″][vc_empty_space height=”25px”][vc_column_text]In lieu of our standard warranty, you have the option to purchase extended warranty coverage of your Metro Auto Salvage auto parts.  We offer three individual packages to choose from.

  • Silver Package-1 year from purchase,

  • Gold Package- 2 years from purchase.

  • Platinum- Our Premiere Coverage-3 years from purchase.

Our Customer Support Professionals will be happy to assist you in determining what package is best for you.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Labor Warranty” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_separator color=”black” style=”shadow” border_width=”6″][vc_empty_space height=”25px”][vc_column_text]We offer a labor warranty based upon the total amount of your service. Please consult with your service professional to determine all labor warranty coverage options.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
